title: I can't purchase championship zed
body: Hey guys i can't purchase championship zed. Please help me . Thank you.

replies.body: its a legacy skin that is only available to specific times. for this skin its available during worlds and maybe msi but im not sure about that one.

Right on the money Timethief49! Championship Zed is a legacy skin that was given out during the 2016 World Finals to help celebrate finals. They still come back from time to time, so keep an eye on our [**Sales Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) to see when he might show up.

You can also find more info on legacy and limited skins in our guide [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins).
Why can't you purchase championship skins?
